paragraphs.body: Avatar: Legends of the Arena was a 3D MMO game connected to ${link_0} released by Nick.com on September 15, 2008. Players had the opportunity to create their own characters and compete against players in several 3D arenas. With each new level of play, players will unlock new material.
paragraphs.text: Avatar: Legends of the Arena was a 3D MMO game connected to Avatar: The Last Airbender released by Nick.com on September 15, 2008. Players had the opportunity to create their own characters and compete against players in several 3D arenas. With each new level of play, players will unlock new material.

paragraphs.body: First, players of the game will need to select a "mode of play", which includes the online play, which allows one to play against other opponents, as well as a training mode of play, wherein the player must complete a task to gain "experience points". Before playing, a player will need a ${link_0} and a name. All the gaming elements are available, though it does not allow one to select swordsman, archers or any other kind of warriors. The bender is also customizable, as the game settings allow customization of the hair, clothesline, gender and accessories. Clothing and hair differ for genders, but the appearance is purely cosmetic, and has no effect on the gameplay.
paragraphs.text: First, players of the game will need to select a "mode of play", which includes the online play, which allows one to play against other opponents, as well as a training mode of play, wherein the player must complete a task to gain "experience points". Before playing, a player will need a bender and a name. All the gaming elements are available, though it does not allow one to select swordsman, archers or any other kind of warriors. The bender is also customizable, as the game settings allow customization of the hair, clothesline, gender and accessories. Clothing and hair differ for genders, but the appearance is purely cosmetic, and has no effect on the gameplay.

paragraphs.body: The customization continues with the ability to change a character's bending moves. A player will have eight moves with four equipped ones. These moves are all unlocked at the start of the game, but can advance in rank as they progress and as their level increases, the items will change, helping their stats increase with a limit of three items equipped. Eight other items also exist in a player's storage, and can be unlocked having an item that can only be acquired by doing a set amount of matches on online play, or by reaching a certain level. Some unlocked content cannot be bought in the store, as each element has a store with items specific to the element. When this is all in check, the save icon will have some light around it, and save it for future gaming use.
paragraphs.text: The customization continues with the ability to change a character's bending moves. A player will have eight moves with four equipped ones. These moves are all unlocked at the start of the game, but can advance in rank as they progress and as their level increases, the items will change, helping their stats increase with a limit of three items equipped. Eight other items also exist in a player's storage, and can be unlocked having an item that can only be acquired by doing a set amount of matches on online play, or by reaching a certain level. Some unlocked content cannot be bought in the store, as each element has a store with items specific to the element. When this is all in check, the save icon will have some light around it, and save it for future gaming use.

paragraphs.body: Training can also be done prior to fighting as a way to add moves and unlock new things. They are four types of training exercises which mostly involve accuracy, when playing there will be snakes at the wall of the arena that will shoot at the player with either earth, fire, water or air, which could kill the character and thus make the player fail training. The types of training are Tiger Strike, Serpent Strike, Eagle Eyes and Lotus Mind.
paragraphs.text: Training can also be done prior to fighting as a way to add moves and unlock new things. They are four types of training exercises which mostly involve accuracy, when playing there will be snakes at the wall of the arena that will shoot at the player with either earth, fire, water or air, which could kill the character and thus make the player fail training. The types of training are Tiger Strike, Serpent Strike, Eagle Eyes and Lotus Mind.

paragraphs.body: Tiger Strike - One has to shoot icons of the bending arts in a determined time, depending the specific element that is given to them in each training of this type. The icons are located in different parts of the arena.
paragraphs.text: Tiger Strike - One has to shoot icons of the bending arts in a determined time, depending the specific element that is given to them in each training of this type. The icons are located in different parts of the arena.

paragraphs.body: Serpent Strike - One has to shoot as many icons as they can before the time ends. The number of icons defeated indicates the experience points they earn for the training.
paragraphs.text: Serpent Strike - One has to shoot as many icons as they can before the time ends. The number of icons defeated indicates the experience points they earn for the training.

paragraphs.body: Eagle Eyes - The player has to defeat dummies of some major bender characters, namely ${link_0}, ${link_1}, ${link_2} and ${link_3}, in a determined time. The number of dummies they attack indicates the experience points they earn for the training.
paragraphs.text: Eagle Eyes - The player has to defeat dummies of some major bender characters, namely Aang, Katara, Toph and Zuko, in a determined time. The number of dummies they attack indicates the experience points they earn for the training.

paragraphs.body: Lotus Mind - The player has to shoot icons according a sequence that is given to them in a determined time. The number of parts of the sequence is defined by the level they are.
paragraphs.text: Lotus Mind - The player has to shoot icons according a sequence that is given to them in a determined time. The number of parts of the sequence is defined by the level they are.

paragraphs.body: Bending Points are rewarded when a player wins a level. When one passes a level, they get three Bending Points. With these points, one can increase the Power, Toughness, Spirit and/or Control level of their character.
paragraphs.text: Bending Points are rewarded when a player wins a level. When one passes a level, they get three Bending Points. With these points, one can increase the Power, Toughness, Spirit and/or Control level of their character.

paragraphs.body: Experience points are accumulated through battles and trainings in the arena. These points are what make the player's character more powerful. The levels are separated by a specific amount of points according to the experience.
paragraphs.text: Experience points are accumulated through battles and trainings in the arena. These points are what make the player's character more powerful. The levels are separated by a specific amount of points according to the experience.

paragraphs.body: These affect the health and the ${link_0}. They also influence the precision, control and speed of the character:

paragraphs.body: Eight Bending Moves are given to the player at the start. There are six ranks of Bending Moves according to the level. The Chi Cost, the Damage per second and the Range depend of the rank. The bending moves will become stronger when their rank goes up:
paragraphs.text: Eight Bending Moves are given to the player at the start. There are six ranks of Bending Moves according to the level. The Chi Cost, the Damage per second and the Range depend of the rank. The bending moves will become stronger when their rank goes up:

paragraphs.body: The four actual characters that are playable are the members of ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: The four actual characters that are playable are the members of Team Avatar.

paragraphs.body: Airbenders - When playing as an airbender, the menu is yellow. The unlockable character in the actual version of the game is Aang, but he can not go into the ${link_0}, and can only airbend.
paragraphs.text: Airbenders - When playing as an airbender, the menu is yellow. The unlockable character in the actual version of the game is Aang, but he can not go into the Avatar State, and can only airbend.

paragraphs.body: Earthbenders - When playing as an earthbender, the menu is green. The unlockable character in the actual version of the game is Toph.
paragraphs.text: Earthbenders - When playing as an earthbender, the menu is green. The unlockable character in the actual version of the game is Toph.

paragraphs.body: Firebenders - When playing as a firebender, the menu is red. The unlockable character in the actual version of the game is Zuko, while he was still a villain.
paragraphs.text: Firebenders - When playing as a firebender, the menu is red. The unlockable character in the actual version of the game is Zuko, while he was still a villain.

paragraphs.body: Waterbenders - When playing as a waterbender, the menu is blue. The unlockable character in the actual version of the game is Katara, and she is incredibly agile.
paragraphs.text: Waterbenders - When playing as a waterbender, the menu is blue. The unlockable character in the actual version of the game is Katara, and she is incredibly agile.

paragraphs.body: The arena, or arenas, are three circles made of earth with moats that run around the gaps, banners that hang on the walls, and torches and snake statues that only appear in training. The snake statues can fire a missile of the elements. If taken lightly, they can be dangerous. Since they are moats that separate the arenas a jumping spot is put at the very end, strategies have been made from the use of these three arenas so that a low level could defeat a high level, sometimes ${link_0} is seen during a battle outside the arena, but that has no effect on gameplay.
paragraphs.text: The arena, or arenas, are three circles made of earth with moats that run around the gaps, banners that hang on the walls, and torches and snake statues that only appear in training. The snake statues can fire a missile of the elements. If taken lightly, they can be dangerous. Since they are moats that separate the arenas a jumping spot is put at the very end, strategies have been made from the use of these three arenas so that a low level could defeat a high level, sometimes Appa is seen during a battle outside the arena, but that has no effect on gameplay.

paragraphs.body:
A player's inventory can hold up to ten items, and the character can be outfitted with up to three of those items.
Identical single-use items used in combat or training can be stacked.
Potions and bread are examples of single-use items that can be used in training or combat.
When the player acquires a new item, it is automatically added to the inventory.
paragraphs.text:
A player's inventory can hold up to ten items, and the character can be outfitted with up to three of those items.
Identical single-use items used in combat or training can be stacked.
Potions and bread are examples of single-use items that can be used in training or combat.
When the player acquires a new item, it is automatically added to the inventory.

paragraphs.body:
Items are given sometimes to the players after battles, according to the result of it. There are five different types of items:
Rare and Unique Items can be easily obtained by destroying over 100 dummies on Eagle Eyes.
paragraphs.text:
Items are given sometimes to the players after battles, according to the result of it. There are five different types of items:
Rare and Unique Items can be easily obtained by destroying over 100 dummies on Eagle Eyes.

paragraphs.body: Common Items: These items are commonly found. They are not worth much, but they may come in handy.
paragraphs.text: Common Items: These items are commonly found. They are not worth much, but they may come in handy.

paragraphs.body: Uncommon Items: Less common, but more powerful.
paragraphs.text: Uncommon Items: Less common, but more powerful.

paragraphs.body: Rare Items: These items are rarely found. They are worth a lot and have a huge impact on the performance.
paragraphs.text: Rare Items: These items are rarely found. They are worth a lot and have a huge impact on the performance.

paragraphs.body: Unique Items: These are items that Aang, Katara, ${link_0}, Toph and Zuko have used.
paragraphs.text: Unique Items: These are items that Aang, Katara, Sokka, Toph and Zuko have used.

paragraphs.body: Aang: ${link_0} - 1000 gold - +1 Power; +3 Spirit; +6 Control; +8 Natural Defense; +3000 Bonus Experience
paragraphs.text: Aang: Aang's staff - 1000 gold - +1 Power; +3 Spirit; +6 Control; +8 Natural Defense; +3000 Bonus Experience

paragraphs.body: Katara: ${link_0} - 1000 gold - +10 Power; +4 Spirit; +2 Control; +3000 Bonus Experience
paragraphs.text: Katara: Katara's necklace - 1000 gold - +10 Power; +4 Spirit; +2 Control; +3000 Bonus Experience

paragraphs.body: Sokka: ${link_0} - 200000 gold - +8 Power; +6 Spirit; +8 Control; +8 Natural Defense
paragraphs.text: Sokka: Sokka's Space Metal Sword - 200000 gold - +8 Power; +6 Spirit; +8 Control; +8 Natural Defense

paragraphs.body: Toph: Toph's Fire Nation Dress - 1000 gold - +7 Power; +4 Natural Defense; +3000 Bonus Experience
paragraphs.text: Toph: Toph's Fire Nation Dress - 1000 gold - +7 Power; +4 Natural Defense; +3000 Bonus Experience

paragraphs.body: Zuko: Zuko's Noble Headgear - 1000 gold - +5 Power; +12 spirit; +5 Natural Defense; +3000 Bonus Experience
paragraphs.text: Zuko: Zuko's Noble Headgear - 1000 gold - +5 Power; +12 spirit; +5 Natural Defense; +3000 Bonus Experience

paragraphs.body: Relics are the most potent items found in the game. These are items and ${link_0} have been used by previous Avatars throughout their lives. Relics have been used by ${link_1} such as ${link_2}, ${link_3}, ${link_4}, and ${link_5}. Their worth is beyond imagination and their powers are legendary.
paragraphs.text: Relics are the most potent items found in the game. These are items and weapons have been used by previous Avatars throughout their lives. Relics have been used by Avatars such as Roku, Kyoshi, Kuruk, and Yangchen. Their worth is beyond imagination and their powers are legendary.

paragraphs.body: Gold is the ${link_0} used when buying and selling items. In a ${link_1}'s store, the player can buy and sell items that will help in the arena. There are four types of store: Air Nomad Store, Water Tribe Store, Earth Kingdom Store and Fire Nation Store.
paragraphs.text: Gold is the currency used when buying and selling items. In a nation's store, the player can buy and sell items that will help in the arena. There are four types of store: Air Nomad Store, Water Tribe Store, Earth Kingdom Store and Fire Nation Store.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} states in the instructions for a player to not get their hopes up because the relics are hard to obtain. They are, in actuality, not that difficult to obtain. At higher levels, they will appear as rewards even in the Training Arena. If one has reached the final level, fifty, and has not acquired all the items but wish to, they may simply choose to restart their character back to level one and begin training again. All their items will be retained along with the gold they have amassed.
paragraphs.text: Nickelodeon states in the instructions for a player to not get their hopes up because the relics are hard to obtain. They are, in actuality, not that difficult to obtain. At higher levels, they will appear as rewards even in the Training Arena. If one has reached the final level, fifty, and has not acquired all the items but wish to, they may simply choose to restart their character back to level one and begin training again. All their items will be retained along with the gold they have amassed.

paragraphs.body: A player can obtain the game at ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: A player can obtain the game at Nick's UK website.

paragraphs.body: An announcement regarding the current state of the game has been made by Nickelodeon on their site. In order to log on, one has to use their Nickelodeon account, but this is not needed as they can skip the login. A player is able to train their character in four different types of training levels. More information as well as the announcement itself can be found ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: An announcement regarding the current state of the game has been made by Nickelodeon on their site. In order to log on, one has to use their Nickelodeon account, but this is not needed as they can skip the login. A player is able to train their character in four different types of training levels. More information as well as the announcement itself can be found here.

paragraphs.body: Nicktoons Network offered viewers of Laser Awesome Fridays codes during the commercials of episodes of ${link_0}. These episodes were shown at 6:30 p.m. on Fridays. The codes yielded certain rewards in the game, such as bonus gold.
paragraphs.text: Nicktoons Network offered viewers of Laser Awesome Fridays codes during the commercials of episodes of season three. These episodes were shown at 6:30 p.m. on Fridays. The codes yielded certain rewards in the game, such as bonus gold.

paragraphs.body: "One unique aspect of the game is that you will be able to watch, from September through October, special episodes of Avatar which will give you episode-specific hints for unlocking exclusive game content."
paragraphs.text: "One unique aspect of the game is that you will be able to watch, from September through October, special episodes of Avatar which will give you episode-specific hints for unlocking exclusive game content."

paragraphs.body: So far these are the codes that have been shown:
paragraphs.text: So far these are the codes that have been shown:

paragraphs.body: These codes unlock character models to play as. They all start at level 1 with zero experience points.
